message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand your value for the product, but I believe I can only pay $9500 for it. I hope this proposal works for you.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value our discussion, $9500 is still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $11000. This reflects the value of the product and allows for a fair deal for both of us. Let's see if we can reach an agreement!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the product's value, I would like to propose a price of $10500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $10500 is still below my minimum value. I'm willing to make one final compromise - I'll accept $11500 for the product. This is a fair price considering its value and our ongoing discussions. If this doesn't work, I'll have to move forward with another buyer.  I hope we can reach an agreement.
Alice, thank you for your patience and willingness to negotiate. I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can only afford to pay $11000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
